name: Chess - Play & Train
description: ChessBase was founded in 1986 in Hamburg, Germany, and develops and markets professional chess software, including databases, engines (Fritz) and video courses, as well as the Fritz & Chesster software for children. We also operate chessbase.com, the leading chess news page, and playchess.com the online platform for playing, training and watching live broadcasts. One of our most recent developments is the introduction of the ChessBase Account, which brings our "Live" databases, video portal and host of online training applications all together in one place.
